AgroecologicalZone.Name: West Africa- Senegal
AgroecologicalZone.Description: Details for a single agroecological zone

InitialFOMinput.Description: Annual FOM input to be used in model initialisation

InitialFOMCtoN.Description: C:N ratio of FOM input to be used in model initialisation

z_lower.Description: Depth below the soil surface of the lower boundary of the layer

fieldCapacity.Description: the field capacity is expressed as 100 * cubic metre/cubic metre

fieldCapacity.Description: the field capacity is expressed as 100 * cubic metre/cubic metre

drainageConst.Description: Rate at which water in excess of field capacity drains from any given layer

AirTemperature.Description: Average monthly air temperature 2 metres above ground

DroughtIndex.Description: Index 0 to 1 of drought (0 = none, 1 = severe)

AverageAirTemperature.Description: Average annual air temperature 2 metres above ground

AirTemperatureMaxDay.Description: Julian day when air temperature is at its maximum

AirTemperaturAmplitude.Description: Maximum deviation of air temperature from the mean

SpeciesGroup.Description: To which species group livestock belongs (1 = cattle, 2 = pigs)

isRuminant.Description: true if the livestock are ruminants

isDairy.Description: true if the livestock are dairy animals

mu_base.Units: Proportion per unit of energy intake, normalised by maintenance energy demand
mu_base.Description: Energy intake below which there is no reduction in utilisation of energy

mu_b.Units: Proportion per unit of energy intake, normalised by maintenance energy demand
mu_b.Description: Rate of reduction in energy utilisation with increasing energy intake

growthNconc.Description: Concentration of nitrogen in animal growth

growthCconc.Description: Concentration of carbon in animal growth

maintenanceEnergyCoeff.Description: Coefficient in calculation of maintenance energy requirement

milkAdjustmentCoeff.Description: Energy requirement per unit of milk produced

urineProp.Description: Proportion of carbon excreted in urine

HousedDuringGrazing.Description: Is true if animals are housing during part of the day when grazed

entericTier2MCF.Units: kg methane per MJ energy intake

Mortality.Description: Proportion of livestock dying on the farm

nitrateEfficiency.Units: kg methane oxidized per kg nitrate
nitrateEfficiency.Description: efficiency of nitrate in feed in reducing methane emissions

Bo.Units: cubic metres methane per kg volatile solids

meanTemp.Description: Mean outside air temperature during the housing period

HousingRefTemp.Description: Reference temperature for ammonia emission factor

EFNH3housingRef.Units: kg ammonia N/kg ammonium in housing

EFNH3housingTier2.Units: kg ammonia N/kg ammonium in housing

feedWasteFactor.Description: Proportion of feed dry matter that is wasted in housing

ProportionDegradable.Description: Proportion of degradable carbon partitioned to solid manure storage, if more than one manure store is used

ProportionNondegradable.Description: Proportion of non-degradable carbon partitioned to solid manure storage, if more than one manure store is used

ProportionTAN.Description: Proportion of ammoniacal N partitioned to solid manure storage, if more than one manure store is used

beddingFactor.Description: Rate of use of bedding dry matter

meanTemp.Description: Mean outside air temperature during the housing period

beddingFactor.Description: Rate of use of bedding dry matter

StoresSolid.Description: Is true if this storage stores solid manure

meanTemp.Description: Mean air temperture during storage period

ohmTAN.Description: Proportion of manure TAN lost by runoff or leaching

ohmOrg.Description: Proportion of manure lost by runoff or leaching

lambda_m.Description: N2 emissions as a multiple of N2O emissions

StorageRefTemp.Description: Reference temperature for ammonia emission factor

StoresSolid.Description: Is true if this storage stores solid manure

meanTemp.Description: Mean air temperture during storage period

ohmTAN.Description: Proportion of manure TAN lost by runoff or leaching

lambda_m.Description: N2 emissions as a multiple of N2O emissions

StorageRefTemp.Description: Reference temperature for ammonia emission factor

NfixationFactor.Description: Rate of reduction in N fixation with increasing mineral N availability

PropAboveGroundResidues.Description: Above-ground yield of dry matter that cannot be harvested

PropBelowGroundResidues.Description: The below-ground crop residues (e.g. roots), as a proportion of the DM yield

BelowGroundCconc.Description: Carbon concentration in below-ground dry matter

MaximumRootingDepth.Description: Maximum rooting depth, if not restricted by soil depth

BelowGroundCtoN.Description: Ratio of carbon to nitrogen in below-ground dry matter

Continues.Description: Is false if this is the last or only phase of a crop

EFN2O.Description: Nitrous oxide emission factor for crop residues

EFN2O_burning.Description: Nitrous oxide emission factor for burnt crop residues (Table 2.5 Guidelines V4_02_Ch2_Generic.pdf)

EFNOx_burning.Description: NOx emission factor for burnt crop residues from Guidebook (assume as NO2)

EFNH3_burning.Description: Ammonia emission factor for burnt crop residues from Guidebook

EFBlackC_burning.Description: Black carbon emission factor for burnt crop residues from Guidebook

EFCO_burning.Description: CO-C emission factor for burnt crop residues from Guidebook

MineralisedSoilN.Description: Emission factors for mineralised soil N

EFNH3FieldRefTemperature.Description: Temperature for reference ammonia emission factor

ManureApplicationTechnique.Name: Broadspread
ManureApplicationTechnique.Description: Details for individual manure application method

NH3ReductionFactor.Description: Reduction in ammonia emission relative to broadcast spreading

ManureApplicationTechnique.Name: Ploughing

NH3ReductionFactor.Description: Reduction in ammonia emission relative to broadcast spreading

NumberRaindays.Description: Total number of rainy days per year
